messages.subject: Update on The Unschooling Conference
messages.msgSnippet: The website for The Unschooling Conference is fully up and running at: unschoolingconference.com H.O.M.E. (Home Oriented Meaningful Education) is sponsoring
messages.messageBody:
The website for The Unschooling Conference is fully up and running at:

unschoolingconference.com

H.O.M.E. (Home Oriented Meaningful Education) is sponsoring Wisconsin's first unschooling conference. It will be one day only, held in Madison, Wisconsin on February 10, 2006. Matt Hern (mightymatthern.com) will be our keynote speaker. Visit the website (or contact me) for additional information on sessions, fees, and registration. We are accepting general registrations at this time.

Happy New Year to All!

Tanya
